p: After preparation and incubation of the extract stock solution and DPPH (diphenyl picryl hydrazine) at room temperature and in the dark for 15 min, the absorbance of the samples was recorded at 517 nm wavelength. Methanol was used as blank and methanol and DPPH were used as control. By measuring the quantity of free radicals inhibited by the extract, the antioxidant activity was reported to be IC 50 (Ghasemi et al. 2009).
